title: Creamy strawberry crepes
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '120ml milk', '120ml water', '3 tablespoons butter, melted', '100g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '225g cream cheese', '150g sifted icing sugar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250ml whipping cream, whipped', '625g sliced strawberries']
